# Clarel

### Data Collection

```{r}
driver <- rsDriver(browser = "firefox",
                   chromever = NULL,
                   verbose = F)

remDr <- driver[["client"]]
```

#### Main Webpage

```{r}
clarel_url <- "https://www.clarel.es/es/"

remDr$navigate(clarel_url)

category_url <- read_html(clarel_url) %>% 
  xml_find_all("//span[contains(@class, 'item_category-slide-item')]/a") %>% 
  xml_attr("href") %>% 
  paste0("https://www.clarel.es",.)
```

#### Hombre page

```{r}
clarel_hombre <- category_url[str_detect(category_url,"hombre")]

remDr$navigate(clarel_hombre)

#Reject cookie
remDr$findElement(using = "xpath", "//button[contains(@class, 'info_cookie-consent-reject-button')]")$clickElement()

#Load more items
load_all_items <- function() {
  tryCatch(
    {
      suppressMessages({
      load_more_button <-remDr$findElement(using = "xpath", 
                                          "//button[contains(@class, 'load-more-items-button')]")
      while(load_more_button$isElementDisplayed()[[1]]) {
      load_more_button$clickElement()
      Sys.sleep(3.5)
      load_more_button <-remDr$findElement(using = "xpath", 
                                           "//button[contains(@class, 'load-more-items-button')]")
      }
      })
    },
    error = function(e){})
}

load_all_items()
```

```{r}
#Get all product info
product_info_paths <- 
  read_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]]) %>% 
  xml_find_all("//div[contains(@class, 'box_product-info')]")

get_product_info <- function(path) {
  brand <- path %>% 
    xml_find_all("div[contains(@class, 'product-featuredbrands')]") %>%
    xml_text()
  
  product_name <- path %>% 
    xml_find_all("a") %>% 
    xml_text()
  
  price <- path %>% 
    xml_find_all("div[contains(@class, 'product-price')]/span[contains(@class,'final-price')]") %>% 
    xml_text()
  
  data.frame(
    brand = brand,
    product_name = product_name,
    price = price
  )
}

hombre_products <- map_dfr(product_info_paths, get_product_info)

hombre_products
```
